sections.heading: Interest; rate; when calculated by the year
sections.text: When in any law, or in any instrument in writing specifying a rate of interest, no period of time is mentioned for which such rate is to be calculated, it shall be deemed to be by the year.SourceLaws 1879, ยง 9, p. 115;R.S.1913, ยง 3354;C.S.1922, ยง 2842;C.S.
